text: The Adventures of Martin Eden is a 1942 American adventure movie directed by Sidney Salkow and was based on the 1909 novel Martin Eden by Jack London. It stars Glenn Ford, Claire Trevor, Frank Conroy, Stuart Erwin, Evelyn Keyes and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1942 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sidney Salkow Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about writers
title: The Adventures of Martin Eden
